# HEIC to JPG Converter - LLM Information

> Convert HEIC to JPG instantly, free, and privately in your browser.

## About This Tool

HEIC to JPG Converter is a free, browser-based tool that converts Apple's HEIC/HEIF image format to universally compatible JPG files. All processing happens locally using WebAssembly - your images never leave your device.

## Key Features

- **100% Private**: All conversion happens in your browser, no uploads
- **Instant Conversion**: WebAssembly-powered for near-native speed
- **Batch Processing**: Convert multiple files at once
- **Quality Modes**: Choose between Balanced (85%) or Maximum (95%) quality
- **ZIP Download**: Download all converted files as a single ZIP
- **No Signup**: No account required, completely free

## How It Works

1. Drop or select HEIC/HEIF files
2. Files are converted instantly using WebAssembly
3. Download individual JPGs or all as ZIP

## Technical Details

- Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Uses libheif compiled to WebAssembly for decoding
- Web Workers for parallel non-blocking conversions
- Hosted on Cloudflare Pages for global edge delivery
